# BRUTX4

BRUTX4 is a multiple Brute-force Programme written by python3

## Feature

1. Hash Cracking
2. Zip File Cracking
3. FTP Cracking

## Hash

Use Code 

```python
import brutx4.hash
brutx4.hash.md5(hash,wordlist)

```
# Hash to Crack
1. md5
2. sha256
3. sha512
4. sha3_256
5.sha3_512
6. blake2b
7. blake2s

## Zip

Use code

```python
import brutx4.Zip
brutx4.Zip.start(zip_file,wordlist)

```

## FTP

Use code

```python
import brutx4.FTP
brutx4.FTP.start(host,username,wordlist)

```

## Author

1. Rakib Hossain

## Installation 

```
pip3 install brutx4
```
